import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/Card'; import { Progress } from './ui/Progress'; import { BookOpen, Clock, Award, Target } from 'lucide-react'; const ProgressPage = () => { // 模拟学习进度数据 const progressData = { overall: 68, courses: [ { id: 1, name: 'React 基础教程', progress: 85, totalLessons: 20, completedLessons: 17 }, { id: 2, name: 'JavaScript 进阶', progress: 60, totalLessons: 15, completedLessons: 9 }, { id: 3, name: 'CSS 样式设计', progress: 45, totalLessons: 12, completedLessons: 5 }, { id: 4, name: 'Node.js 后端开发', progress: 30, totalLessons: 18, completedLessons: 5 }, ], stats: { totalStudyTime: 156, completedCourses: 2, totalCourses: 8, certificates: 1 } }; // 环形进度组件 const CircularProgress = ({ percentage, size = 120, strokeWidth = 8 }) => { const radius = (size - strokeWidth) / 2; const circumference = radius * 2 * Math.PI; const strokeDasharray = circumference; const strokeDashoffset = circumference - (percentage / 100) * circumference; return (
{percentage}%
); }; return (

学习进度

查看您的学习进展和成就

{/* 总体进度卡片 */}
总体进度 学习统计

{progressData.stats.totalStudyTime}h

总学习时长

{progressData.stats.completedCourses}/{progressData.stats.totalCourses}

完成课程

{progressData.stats.certificates}

获得证书

{progressData.overall}%

总体完成度
{/* 课程进度列表 */} 课程进度详情
{progressData.courses.map((course) => (

{course.name}

{course.completedLessons}/{course.totalLessons} 课时完成

{course.progress}%
已完成 {course.completedLessons} 课时 还需 {course.totalLessons - course.completedLessons} 课时
))}
{/* 学习建议 */} 学习建议

💡 个性化建议

  • • 建议优先完成 "React 基础教程"，您已经完成了 85%
  • • "JavaScript 进阶" 课程进度良好，保持学习节奏
  • • 可以适当增加每日学习时长，目标是每天 2-3 小时
  • • 完成当前课程后，建议参加相关的小测练习巩固知识
); }; export default ProgressPage;
